title: Pixel 5 performs poorly at video calls using front camera.
content:
Hello,

does anyone feel that, the front camera is performing poorly during video calls?
The pictures through the camera app are fine. But I belive that to be because of the post-processing.
My picture quality during video calls resembles phones that I used maybe 6 years ago. Is there any way to adjust that or do we have to be satisfied with the outdated sensor without post-processing in video calls?

For reference my P20 performs lightyears ahead in this (but yeah different hardware)
